source_objects.title: Pet Care & Training
source_objects.description: Learn the best kept secrets in pet care and pet training: dogs, cats, rabbits, horses, fish and many more.

items.title: Basic Canine Acupressure for Dog Owners
items.headline: Acupressure techniques to ease your dog's pain and stress
objectives_summary: Basic acupressure  and massage techniques to ease your dog's pain, stress and common ailments.
18 Acupressure points for neck. shoulder, knee and back pain, arthritis and hip dysplasia,
Acupressure points for incontinence, kidney & bladder problems

items.title: Dog body language. How To Read Your Dog's Body Language

visible_instructors.name: Fedra
visible_instructors.job_title: Certified Dog Trainer and Veterinary student
visible_instructors.title: Fedra Dirani

items.headline: What Is Your Dog Trying To Tell You?
objectives_summary: You will learn to read dog body language
you will learn to recognize quickly different dog moods
you will understand how a dog communicate with another dog, and you will learn to avoid unplesant fights

items.title: Animal Nutrition & Ration Formulation
items.headline: Everything you need to know to start making your own complete balanced animal rations and pet diet.
objectives_summary: Create complete animal feed by hand
Understand the commonly used feed ingredients
Learn and understand animal nutrition concepts

items.title: Dog Training for Humans - Clicker Free Trick Training
items.headline: The ultimate beginners course to easily teach any dog five simple tricks that will help you have more FUN and CONTROL.
objectives_summary: Learn the proven method to teaching your dog any trick.
Advance your own dog training abiltiy and train like a professional dog trainer.
Enjoy a strengthened relationship with your dog and have more focus when you exercise him off lead.

items.title: Home Dog Care Business: Dog Boarding, Walking & Pet Sitting

visible_instructors.name: Tatiana
visible_instructors.job_title: Grow your creative thinking, writing & dog business skills
visible_instructors.title: Tatiana Ambrose

items.headline: Market your dog care services: pet sitting, dog walking, dog training, pet boarding & dog kennel locally with Google SEO
objectives_summary: Transform your pet care business into an empire that dominates your local area
Promote your dog business as a local service to build your customer base in your area
Access different resources to promote your dog business online to get your first clients

items.title: Dog Training - Polite Leash Walking Class
items.headline: Got a dog that pulls you off your feet? Take this course to teach your dog polite loose-leash walking.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be familiar with all the techniques and exercises needed to train a dog to walk politely on leash.

items.title: Dog Training For Humans - 'Worry Free Dog Walks'.
items.headline: How to enjoy more focus, more fun (and less stress) on your daily dog walks.
objectives_summary: At the end of this course students will know how to control thier dogs on and off lead at the dog park

items.title: Pet CPR (Advanced)
items.headline: Know when and how to administer CPR to a pet animal, including recognising the signs of unconsciousness and shock
objectives_summary: Knowing how to confidently and effectively administer CPR to an animal is essential. Pets suffer from accidents, traumas and clinical emergencies just like humans do, so having the knowledge and confidence to "step in" and deal with an emergency is really important.

items.headline: Easily Prevent, Objectively Assess & Quickly Resolve Dog Aggression Problems
objectives_summary: Prevent temperament and aggression problems from developing
Objectively assess the severity of dog aggression
Resolve the majority of dog aggression problems

items.headline: Learn how to use natural remedies to treat your dog's illnesses & for dog training. Say goodbye to big veterinary bills!
objectives_summary: Which herbs work wonders with specific health complaints and behaviours in dogs plus where you can get them for a very good price.
What Homeopathic Remedies are good to use when dealing with particular ailments and behaviours in dogs.
What the number one remedy is that works like magic for so many health conditions in both dogs and humans.

items.title: Therapy Dog Training: Does Your Dog Have What it Takes?
items.headline: Learn What a Therapy Dog is, What's Required For Therapy Dog Certification, and If Your Dog is a Good Fit
objectives_summary: Therapy Dog Training Requirements

objectives_summary: Raise backyard chickens

items.title: Healing Flower Essences and Crystals for Animals
items.headline: Emotional First Aid for Pets
objectives_summary: Learn about Bach Flower Remedies and Crystals for pets with emotional and behavior issues.
Learn about Bach Flower Rescue Remedy and its healing ingredients and how to use it for animals.
Learn about individual Bach Flower Essences for specific emotions and behaviors with pets.

items.title: Dog Health and First Aid

visible_instructors.name: Dr Sophie
visible_instructors.job_title: Veterinary Surgeon BVMS MRCVS & Pet first aid instructor
visible_instructors.title: Dr Sophie Bell - BVMS MRCVS

items.headline: The Complete Canine Health & First Aid Course Online
objectives_summary: Written, produced and presented by vet Dr Sophie Bell - BVMS MRCVS. Vital signs, bloat, pyometra, toxins, managing seizures, practical bandaging and CPR, vital first-aid tips you can use at home. Managing common conditions like diarrhoea, kennel cough and conjunctivitis, recognising an internal bleed and dealing with trauma.  CBD oil, arnica and pain management, how to carry out a number of procedures such as giving an injection and so much more!

items.title: How to Get Started Raising Goats
items.headline: from choosing the breed to daily care
objectives_summary: Choose the breed of goat best suited to their goals and situation.
Choose which specific goats they want to get.
Provide daily care and routine maintenance for their goats to keep them happy and healthy.
